entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 07:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -14.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:20 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 07:20 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
